title: Untitled
marks:

LL: [ARCHIVE PROOF (projec
description: Macabre scene featuring a large foot, center, with long claws and a nail protruding from its sole; the top half of a face, LL; two small birds in background; hanging chain on R; orbits in the UL and URQs
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
